column4: can you use top or gnome-system-monitor and see what process is peaking you CPU ? May be that will tell you something ...
CPU usage is only at 2.2% on all cores
hmm .. can you try cat /proc/acpi/thermal_zone/THM0/* and look at your temps and also cat /proc/acpi/ibm/fan
I ran those commands and put the outputs in this paste. http://paste.ubuntu.com/511127/
